title: Radioplay in other languages.
body:
Hello everyone!
I am from Chile and wanted to know if Radioplay will be in other languages. For example Spanish.
Regards!

{{champion:68}}: {{champion:18}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:42}}

replies.body: Hey! We are evaluating what is the best way to do this right now. Our goal is to eventually have the radioplay available in other languages.

this would be awesome!
Please do it. It will do a big ambientation to the game.
